properties.title: IntEnz release utils module change log
properties.author: Rafael Alcántara

release.action: Updated dependencies on intenz.mapper, xchars.xchars, xchars.config and biobabel.db modules.
Added dependency to compile scope - it was in test scope - to biobabel.db module.
Added script release.sh to run sequentially the two main update scripts.
Moved sql directory under src/main. Updated scripts accordingly.
Updated to latest biobabel.db module dependency, to make use of OracleDatabaseInstance.
